HighScore

Class SqlReadWrite

  • java.lang.Object
    • HighScore.SqlReadWrite

  • public class SqlReadWrite
extends java.lang.Object
    the class SqlReadWrite gives all the functionality to the sql database the methods used to read and write highscores in the sql database are stated in this class.

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<Score> highscores

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void DeleteHigHscores()
      the delete highscores method drops the highscores table from the database.
      static java.sql.Connection getConnection() 
      static java.util.ArrayList<Score> getHighscores() 
      static Score getMostRecentScore() 
      static void Read()
      the Read method reads all the highscores saved in the table and then puts it in a arraylist, the higscores are selected from the database using an sql query.
      static void startConnection()
      the method startConnection is used to setup the connection with the sql database and creates if the table does not all ready exist a table where it is possible to save highscores.
      static void Write(Score score)
      the write method is used to put scores in the sql table which is saved in the online data base.

      • startConnection

        public static void startConnection()
        the method startConnection is used to setup the connection with the sql database and creates if the table does not all ready exist a table where it is possible to save highscores.

      • Write

        public static void Write(Score score)
        the write method is used to put scores in the sql table which is saved in the online data base.
        Parameters:
        score - the object score has all the information that we put in the table

      • Read

        public static void Read()
        the Read method reads all the highscores saved in the table and then puts it in a arraylist, the higscores are selected from the database using an sql query.

        the delete highscores method drops the highscores table from the database.
